playRecGst

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • playRecGst.Controller

  • public final class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class is a controller middle-ware to handle Player and Recorder.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller()
      Constructor which instantiate a SoundRecorder element, a Sound player element and defaults folders.
